summary: This is an email chain from December 8, 2008, discussing an upcoming sentencing hearing for an individual (likely 'MI'), a deposition of Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for January, and a reference to a 15-year-old victim allegedly recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell. It shows coordination between legal parties regarding case developments.

persons.name: Spencer Kuvin
persons.context: Represents a 15-year-old victim who was allegedly recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell; has Epstein set for a deposition in January which will be videotaped.

persons.name: Judge Hurley
persons.context: Presiding over a sentencing hearing scheduled for Friday at 3:00.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of a deposition scheduled for January in a civil case, which will be videotaped.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as allegedly recruiting a 15-year-old victim.

connections.description: Kuvin represents a victim in a civil case against Epstein and has scheduled his deposition.
Maxwell is alleged to have recruited a 15-year-old victim for Epstein.
Kuvin's client is a victim allegedly recruited by Maxwell.

events.title: MI Sentencing Hearing
events.description: A sentencing hearing before Judge Hurley scheduled for Friday at 3:00 PM.

events.title: Epstein Deposition
events.description: A deposition of Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for January in a civil case, to be videotaped.

keyFacts: A 15-year-old victim was allegedly recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell for Jeffrey Epstein.
Attorney Spencer Kuvin represents that victim and has scheduled a videotaped deposition of Epstein for January 2009.
A sentencing hearing for an individual referred to as 'MI' was scheduled for December 12, 2008, before Judge Hurley.
The email chain shows legal professionals discussing and coordinating on case developments involving Epstein and Maxwell in late 2008.
